desc.en: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.
desc.jp: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而遥香却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而遥香却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱露在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而春香却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。

desc.en: The ramen restaurant owner mistakes the Problem Solver 68 for Abydos' friends. Aru suddenly realizes that it was the restaurant that prevents her being a real villain. Haruka, who is unsure of Aru's intention, still blows up the restaurant without a second thought.
desc.jp: The ramen restaurant owner mistakes the Problem Solver 68 for Abydos' friends. Aru suddenly realizes that it was the restaurant that prevents her being a real villain. Haruka, who is unsure of Aru's intention, still blows up the restaurant without a second thought.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 拉面店老板错认便利屋68为阿拜多斯的朋友，阿露突然间领悟到了什么，认为是这家拉面店阻碍了她成为真正的坏蛋。遥香尚未听清就反手炸掉了拉面店。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 拉面店老板错认便利屋68为阿拜多斯的朋友，亚瑠突然间领悟到了什么，认为是这家拉面店阻碍了她成为真正的坏蛋。遥香尚未听清就反手炸掉了拉面店。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 拉面店老板错认便利屋68为阿拜多斯的朋友，爱露突然间领悟到了什么，认为是这家拉面店阻碍了她成为真正的坏蛋。春香尚未听清就反手炸掉了拉面店。

desc.en: Unaware of Aru's true feelings, the Foreclosure Task Force blame Aru for the heinous atrocity she accidentally caused. Eventually, Aru ends up confronting the team, pretending to be the villain they believe she is.
desc.jp: Unaware of Aru's true feelings, the Foreclosure Task Force blame Aru for the heinous atrocity she accidentally caused. Eventually, Aru ends up confronting the team, pretending to be the villain they believe she is.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 无意中犯下惨无人道的暴行的阿露。对策委员会的学生没明白阿露的内心就指责她。结果阿露真的模仿坏蛋与对策委员会对立。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 无意中犯下惨无人道的暴行的亚瑠。对策委员会的学生没明白亚瑠的内心就指责她。结果亚瑠真的模仿坏蛋与对策委员会对立。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 无意中犯下惨无人道的暴行的爱露。对策委员会的学生没明白爱露的内心就指责她。结果爱露真的模仿坏蛋与对策委员会对立。

desc.en: During the climax of the battle between Problem Solver and Foreclosure Task Force, the combatants are suddenly shelled from afar. Ayane announces that the cannons were fired by Gehenna Academy's Prefect Team.
desc.jp: During the climax of the battle between Problem Solver and Foreclosure Task Force, the combatants are suddenly shelled from afar. Ayane announces that the cannons were fired by Gehenna Academy's Prefect Team.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在便利屋和对策委员会的战斗达到最高潮时，砲击突然从远方袭来。绫音说发动砲击的是歌赫娜学园的风纪委员会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 就在便利屋和对策委员会的战斗达到最高潮时，砲击突然从远方袭来。绫音说发动砲击的是格黑娜学园的风纪委员会。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在便利屋和对策委员会的战斗达到最高潮时，砲击突然从远方袭来。绫音说发动砲击的是格黑娜学园的风纪委员会。

desc.en: Haruka blows up the restaurant at the confusing speech delivered by Aru, which even makes Mutsuki start blaming Aru. Upon arrival, the Foreclosure Task Force is even more furious when they discovered the evil doer. They starts the battle immediately.
desc.jp: Haruka blows up the restaurant at the confusing speech delivered by Aru, which even makes Mutsuki start blaming Aru. Upon arrival, the Foreclosure Task Force is even more furious when they discovered the evil doer. They starts the battle immediately.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为阿露的失语使得遥香炸掉了拉面店，就连睦月也开始生气了。对策委员会赶到后发现是便利屋68，更加怒不可遏，遂直接开始了战斗。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 因为亚瑠的失语使得遥香炸掉了拉面店，就连无月也开始生气了。对策委员会赶到后发现是便利屋68，更加怒不可遏，遂直接开始了战斗。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 因为爱露的失语使得春香炸掉了拉面店，就连睦月也开始生气了。对策委员会赶到后发现是便利屋68，更加怒不可遏，遂直接开始了战斗。

desc.en: Gehenna's Prefect Team declares their intent to arrest the members of Problem Solver 68. The Foreclosure Task Force prepares for battle, rebutting that Gehenna Academy has no authority to make such an arrest on Abydos territory.
desc.jp: Gehenna's Prefect Team declares their intent to arrest the members of Problem Solver 68. The Foreclosure Task Force prepares for battle, rebutting that Gehenna Academy has no authority to make such an arrest on Abydos territory.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 歌赫娜风纪委员会表明，自己的目的是来抓便利屋的问题学生。然而对策委员会学生却反驳说，其他学园的风纪委员会在阿拜多斯高中自治区活动实属越权，以此与歌赫娜风纪委员会针锋相对。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 格黑娜风纪委员会表明，自己的目的是来抓便利屋的问题学生。然而对策委员会学生却反驳说，其他学园的风纪委员会在阿拜多斯高中自治区活动实属越权，以此与格黑娜风纪委员会针锋相对。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 格黑娜风纪委员会表明，自己的目的是来抓便利屋的问题学生。然而对策委员会学生却反驳说，其他学园的风纪委员会在阿拜多斯高中自治区活动实属越权，以此与格黑娜风纪委员会针锋相对。

desc.en: Despite being outnumbered, the Foreclosure Task Force is victorious with Sensei's guidance. After the battle, the senior administrator of Gehenna's Prefect Team, Ako, steps in to mediate. Meanwhile, Haruka hatches a conspiracy.
desc.jp: Despite being outnumbered, the Foreclosure Task Force is victorious with Sensei's guidance. After the battle, the senior administrator of Gehenna's Prefect Team, Ako, steps in to mediate. Meanwhile, Haruka hatches a conspiracy.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 歌赫娜风纪委员会虽然占有数量上的优势，结果还是不敌老师所指挥的对策委员会学生，最后以战败收场。战斗一结束，歌赫娜风纪委员会的资深行政官亚子出面调解，而遥香则趁机开始策划某种阴谋。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 格黑娜风纪委员会虽然占有数量上的优势，结果还是不敌老师所指挥的对策委员会学生，最后以战败收场。战斗一结束，格黑娜风纪委员会的资深行政官亚子出面调解，而遥香则趁机开始策划某种阴谋。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 格黑娜风纪委员会虽然占有数量上的优势，结果还是不敌老师所指挥的对策委员会学生，最后以战败收场。战斗一结束，格黑娜风纪委员会的资深行政官亚子出面调解，而春香则趁机开始策划某种阴谋。

desc.en: The Prefect Team takes down the Problem Solver 68 successfully, yet it arises the dissatisfaction of Abydos. As the other party is operating in Abydos without proper permission, such actions can be seen as ignoring authority. Everyone decides to engage.
desc.jp: The Prefect Team takes down the Problem Solver 68 successfully, yet it arises the dissatisfaction of Abydos. As the other party is operating in Abydos without proper permission, such actions can be seen as ignoring authority. Everyone decides to engage.
desc.zh_cn: 风纪委员会成功放倒了便利屋68一行人，但却引来了阿拜多斯一行人的不满。由于对方未经授权在阿拜多斯境内活动，有无视权限之疑，众人决定迎战。

desc.en: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.jp: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.zh_cn: 由于和风纪委员会的亚子交涉不顺利，以至于最后充满敌对气息。对策委员会决定与便利屋一行人合作，对抗具有压倒性战力的风纪委员会。

desc.en: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.jp: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.zh_cn: 好不容易结束了艰苦的战斗，但是风纪委员的数量又大为增加。那时，风纪委员长阳奈现身，针对此状况责问亚子。

desc.en: Sensei suddenly makes an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezes a smile and then leaves in a hurry. Sensei also pretends not paying any attention.
desc.jp: Sensei suddenly makes an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezes a smile and then leaves in a hurry. Sensei also pretends not paying any attention.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师突然将视线与遥香的对上了。遥香对老师笑了一下，然后匆匆离开。老师也假装并无在意。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师突然将视线与遥香的对上了。遥香对老师笑了一下，然后匆匆离开。老师也假装并无在意。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师突然将视线与春香的对上了。春香对老师笑了一下，然后匆匆离开。老师也假装并无在意。

desc.en: Ako first apologizes for the attack launched by Prefect Team and hopes to transfer the Problem Solver 68 to them for further investigation, which is naturally rejected. Ayane argues with factual facts, yet Ako refuses to take a step back. She says "It's probably because you have Schale's Sensei at your side."
desc.jp: Ako first apologizes for the attack launched by Prefect Team and hopes to transfer the Problem Solver 68 to them for further investigation, which is naturally rejected. Ayane argues with factual facts, yet Ako refuses to take a step back. She says "It's probably because you have Schale's Sensei at your side."
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子首先为风纪委员会发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望对策委员会将便利屋68的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。绫音据理力争，而亚子则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有夏莱的老师站在你们这边吧”。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚子首先为风纪委员会发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望对策委员会将便利屋68的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。绫音据理力争，而亚子则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有夏莱的老师站在你们这边吧”。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚子首先为风纪委员会发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望对策委员会将便利屋68的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。绫音据理力争，而亚子则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有沙勒的老师站在你们这边吧”。

desc.en: The negotiations ends badly and Ako decides to attack again. Yet the Prefect Team is suddenly assaulted by Haruka. Meanwhile, Kayoko begins to gradually expose Ako's deception: the way that leading much troops to trouble in another district is definitely not Hina's doings, but in fact Ako's; the target is actually Schale, and it will make sense to lead extra troops.
desc.jp: The negotiations ends badly and Ako decides to attack again. Yet the Prefect Team is suddenly assaulted by Haruka. Meanwhile, Kayoko begins to gradually expose Ako's deception: the way that leading much troops to trouble in another district is definitely not Hina's doings, but in fact Ako's; the target is actually Schale, and it will make sense to lead extra troops.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而对策委员会突然受到遥香的攻击，同时佳代子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非阳奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是夏莱，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而对策委员会突然受到遥香的攻击，同时佳世子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非阳奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是夏莱，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而对策委员会突然受到春香的攻击，同时佳代子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非阳奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是沙勒，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。

desc.en: Being exposed, Ako launches another attack without further ado, and declares everyone her own plan: as the Eden Treaty going to be signed, the Prefect Team worry that such organization will interfere the signing (the intel itself comes from Trinity's Hifumi telling it to the Tea Party, which then was gotten on hand by Gehenna). As planned, they will first put Sensei under house arrest and then deal with Problem Solver 68.
desc.jp: Being exposed, Ako launches another attack without further ado, and declares everyone her own plan: as the Eden Treaty going to be signed, the Prefect Team worry that such organization will interfere the signing (the intel itself comes from Trinity's Hifumi telling it to the Tea Party, which then was gotten on hand by Gehenna). As planned, they will first put Sensei under house arrest and then deal with Problem Solver 68.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子被拆穿后立刻发起了攻击，并向所有人直接宣告了自己的计划：由于伊甸条约签署在即，风纪委员会担心夏莱这样的组织会干涉条约签署（这一情报来源于三一的日富美将内容给了茶会，而茶会的情报又被歌赫娜拿到手了），于是便打算先将老师软禁在歌赫娜，顺带处理便利屋68。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚子被拆穿后立刻发起了攻击，并向所有人直接宣告了自己的计划：由于伊甸条约签署在即，风纪委员会担心夏莱这样的组织会干涉条约签署（这一情报来源于三一的日步美将内容给了茶会，而茶会的情报又被格黑娜拿到手了），于是便打算先将老师软禁在格黑娜，顺带处理便利屋68。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚子被拆穿后立刻发起了攻击，并向所有人直接宣告了自己的计划：由于伊甸条约签署在即，风纪委员会担心沙勒这样的组织会干涉条约签署（这一情报来源于三一的日富美将内容给了茶会，而茶会的情报又被格黑娜拿到手了），于是便打算先将老师软禁在格黑娜，顺带处理便利屋68。

desc.en: Having heard Ako's story, Hina promptly apologizes for the Prefect Team overstepping their bounds. While commanding her forces to pull out, Hina subtly informs Sensei that the Kaiser Corporation is up to something in the Abydos Desert.
desc.jp: Having heard Ako's story, Hina promptly apologizes for the Prefect Team overstepping their bounds. While commanding her forces to pull out, Hina subtly informs Sensei that the Kaiser Corporation is up to something in the Abydos Desert.
desc.zh_cn: 阳奈听闻来龙去脉后，对于亚子擅自动用风纪委员会一事，老实地向对策委员会道歉。另外在撤兵的同时，阳奈悄悄地给老师情报，告诉老师凯萨在阿拜多斯沙漠做些什么事。

desc.en: Ako tries to explain that she is fighting against Problem Solver 68, but the latter has been long gone. Hina gets even angrier but then expresses her understanding, yet she still points out that such political issues should be left to the Pandemonium Society. Hina says Ako will be punished with confinement.
desc.jp: Ako tries to explain that she is fighting against Problem Solver 68, but the latter has been long gone. Hina gets even angrier but then expresses her understanding, yet she still points out that such political issues should be left to the Pandemonium Society. Hina says Ako will be punished with confinement.
desc.zh_cn: 亚子试图解释自己是在和便利屋68作战，但转眼间后者便消失不见。阳奈的脸越来越黑，不过随后表示理解，但仍然指出此类政治问题应交由万魔殿进行处理。阳奈表示将处以亚子紧闭处分。

desc.en: Hina says the conflict is indeed their wrong doings, but it's also true that they had interfered with Gehenna's official duties. The Abydos remain hostile, though. At this moment Ayane mentions Hoshino, and Hoshino appears just on time. Hina exchanges a few words with Hoshino and expresses her surprise at Hoshino's dramatic character change. Hina mentions "that incident" and suddenly realizes something.
desc.jp: Hina says the conflict is indeed their wrong doings, but it's also true that they had interfered with Gehenna's official duties. The Abydos remain hostile, though. At this moment Ayane mentions Hoshino, and Hoshino appears just on time. Hina exchanges a few words with Hoshino and expresses her surprise at Hoshino's dramatic character change. Hina mentions "that incident" and suddenly realizes something.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阳奈表示冲突确实是自己人不对，但干涉了歌赫娜的公务却也是事实。众人表示不会轻易放过。就在这时绫音提起了星野，而星野也随叫随到。阳奈与星野寒暄了几句，对星野性格变化之大表示惊讶。阳奈提到了“那次事件”，随后突然意识到了什么。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳奈表示冲突确实是自己人不对，但干涉了格黑娜的公务却也是事实。众人表示不会轻易放过。就在这时绫音提起了星野，而星野也随叫随到。阳奈与星野寒暄了几句，对星野性格变化之大表示惊讶。阳奈提到了“那次事件”，随后突然意识到了什么。

desc.en: Hoshino recounts history to the Foreclosure Task Force. It's likely the now-defunct Abydos Student Council tried to repay its debts until the land was eventually repossessed by the Kaiser Corporation. Sensei suggests following Hina's hint and to go to the Abydos Desert.
desc.jp: Hoshino recounts history to the Foreclosure Task Force. It's likely the now-defunct Abydos Student Council tried to repay its debts until the land was eventually repossessed by the Kaiser Corporation. Sensei suggests following Hina's hint and to go to the Abydos Desert.
desc.zh_cn: 对策委员会从星野口中听说昔日往事。现在推测，消失的阿拜多斯学生会为了偿还债务，结果但却连土地都被凯萨抢走了。老师依照从阳奈那里听说的，提议前往阿拜多斯沙漠。

desc.en: The truth is, most of the land in Abydos has been owned by Kaiser Corporation (Kaiser Construction to be exact). Not only is everyone confused about the reason behind it, but also how it was done. Hoshino and Ayane says that these transactions should only be made by the people from the former student union, as they had the highest authority.
desc.jp: The truth is, most of the land in Abydos has been owned by Kaiser Corporation (Kaiser Construction to be exact). Not only is everyone confused about the reason behind it, but also how it was done. Hoshino and Ayane says that these transactions should only be made by the people from the former student union, as they had the highest authority.
desc.zh_cn: 事实是，阿拜多斯的大多数土地均已归属于凯撒集团（凯撒建设）。众人不仅对为何要夺走这么多土地表示疑问，也不解究竟是怎么办到的。星野和绫音表示，由于学生会有学校的最高权限，因而这些交易应都是由前学生会的人所做。

desc.en: Hoshino describes the situation back then, and in a nutshell, it was in chaos. The desertification was extremely serious at then, and the school was forced to relocate for several times. Not only did the student number dropping fast, teachers nowhere to find, but also most of the student union had resigned. There was only one left, but that person was unreliable, just like Hoshino had a bad temper at then, according to Hoshino. Everyone is shocked by the fact. Shiroko says Hoshino has no need to belittle herself, saying that she is a responsible president.
desc.jp: Hoshino describes the situation back then, and in a nutshell, it was in chaos. The desertification was extremely serious at then, and the school was forced to relocate for several times. Not only did the student number dropping fast, teachers nowhere to find, but also most of the student union had resigned. There was only one left, but that person was unreliable, just like Hoshino had a bad temper at then, according to Hoshino. Everyone is shocked by the fact. Shiroko says Hoshino has no need to belittle herself, saying that she is a responsible president.
desc.zh_cn: 星野阐述了当时情况，总结起来十分混乱。当时荒漠化已经非常严重，学校被迫搬迁数次。不仅学生只剩下两位数、教职工基本不存在导致教学停止，学生会的人也大多已经辞职，只剩下另外一位前辈。但星野表示那位前辈也不靠谱，而她那时性格也并不怎样。众人对此表示惊异。白字表示星野没有必要这么贬低自己，表示她是个很有责任感的会长。

desc.en: Everyone starts to discuss why the school would have decided to sell the land to Kaiser. Everyone thinks it is because of the debts. However, due to the low selling prices, it was no use after all. Sensei suddenly notices that, both the lender and buyer are all Kaiser, and Abydos is in fact in a trap, whose goal might actually be the land of Abydos. Serika can't understand why the student union would do such things, but Hoshino says that people would certainly do such if they are cornered.
desc.jp: Everyone starts to discuss why the school would have decided to sell the land to Kaiser. Everyone thinks it is because of the debts. However, due to the low selling prices, it was no use after all. Sensei suddenly notices that, both the lender and buyer are all Kaiser, and Abydos is in fact in a trap, whose goal might actually be the land of Abydos. Serika can't understand why the student union would do such things, but Hoshino says that people would certainly do such if they are cornered.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 大家开始讨论学校究竟为什么要把土地卖给凯撒集团。大家普遍认为是债款已经堆积过多导致，但由于出售价格过低，实际上也没有什么用。这时老师突然注意到，贷款方和购买方似乎都是凯撒集团，阿拜多斯实际上中了凯撒集团的圈套，后者目标很可能是阿拜多斯的土地。芹香无法理解学生会为什么会做出这样的决定，但星野则表示，走投无路的人们的确会做出这样的事。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 大家开始讨论学校究竟为什么要把土地卖给凯撒集团。大家普遍认为是债款已经堆积过多导致，但由于出售价格过低，实际上也没有什么用。这时老师突然注意到，贷款方和购买方似乎都是凯撒集团，阿拜多斯实际上中了凯撒集团的圈套，后者目标很可能是阿拜多斯的土地。茜香无法理解学生会为什么会做出这样的决定，但星野则表示，走投无路的人们的确会做出这样的事。

desc.en: With current clues on hand, Ayane finally confirms that Kaiser's goal is exactly the land of Abydos. The exact reason remains unknown. Sensei tells everyone the things he heard from Hina, and everyone decides to go to the desert immediately.
desc.jp: With current clues on hand, Ayane finally confirms that Kaiser's goal is exactly the land of Abydos. The exact reason remains unknown. Sensei tells everyone the things he heard from Hina, and everyone decides to go to the desert immediately.
desc.zh_cn: 绫音通过已有的线索，最终认定凯撒集团盯上的正是阿拜多斯的土地，但对具体原因仍并不特别清楚。老师向各位讲出了从阳奈那听来的事情，众人立刻决定前往沙漠。

desc.en: Before leaving, Shiroko stops Sensei. In a classroom, Shiroko shows Sensei the thing she found in Hoshino's bag: a resignation application, with the name "Takanashi Hoshino". Sensei asks why Shiroko would do so, and Shiroko says it was because she thought that recently, Hoshino seems to be behaving particularly strange, and there must be something hidden.
desc.jp: Before leaving, Shiroko stops Sensei. In a classroom, Shiroko shows Sensei the thing she found in Hoshino's bag: a resignation application, with the name "Takanashi Hoshino". Sensei asks why Shiroko would do so, and Shiroko says it was because she thought that recently, Hoshino seems to be behaving particularly strange, and there must be something hidden.
desc.zh_cn: 走之前，白子叫住了老师。在一间教室里，白子向老师展示了从星野书包中找到的东西：退社信，对策委员会小鸟游星野。老师问白子为什么会这么做，白子则表示是因为他觉得星野最近的行为非常怪异，之中一定有不可告人的东西。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.

desc.en: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.
desc.jp: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.
desc.zh_cn: 星野在信上写说，为了免除阿拜多斯高中的债务，自己已经去当凯萨PMC的佣兵。在其余对策委员会一行人深感混乱之际，PMC兵力为了占领星野消失踪影的阿拜多斯高中而来犯。

desc.en: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confesses the fact that she is going to be a mercenary at PMC, and says that "(the Black Suit) will take on half of Abydos' debt".
desc.jp: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confesses the fact that she is going to be a mercenary at PMC, and says that "(the Black Suit) will take on half of Abydos' debt".
desc.zh_cn: 星野留下了退社书和一封信。在信中，星野向所有人坦白了去PMC做佣兵的事情，并说出了“（黑服）将会承担一半阿拜多斯债务”的事情。

desc.en: BG_CS_Abydos_06.jpg Description
desc.jp: BG_CS_Abydos_06.jpg Description
desc.zh_cn: BG_CS_Abydos_06.jpg Description

desc.en: Hoshino signs at PMC office. Black Suit says that in this way, Hoshino will be transferring all her rights to him (in other words, Hoshino just sold herself), and promises the debt will be taken care as promised.
desc.jp: Hoshino signs at PMC office. Black Suit says that in this way, Hoshino will be transferring all her rights to him (in other words, Hoshino just sold herself), and promises the debt will be taken care as promised.
desc.zh_cn: 星野在PMC办公室签了名。黑服表示，这样的话，星野就将自己所有的权利转移给了他（相当于卖了自己），并承诺债款将会如约承担。

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.en: After joining up with Kaiser PMC, Hoshino defects when she learns that Abydos High School is under attack, but is then arrested by Black Suit. When all hope seems lost, Problem Solver 68 returns to Abydos to lend their aid to the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.jp: After joining up with Kaiser PMC, Hoshino defects when she learns that Abydos High School is under attack, but is then arrested by Black Suit. When all hope seems lost, Problem Solver 68 returns to Abydos to lend their aid to the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.zh_cn: 抵达凯萨PMC的星野，听到阿拜多斯高中正遭受攻击的消息后表示抗议，但却反而被黑色西装人拘禁。在千钧一发之际，先前离开的便利屋68一行人出现在阿拜多斯，帮了对策委员会一把。

desc.en: Kaiser Director arrives and everyone is immediately triggered. Though claiming that they would be reported to the General Student Council, the director says it is useless and the time just proves that no one could be helping them. The director even points out that, due to Hoshino's dropout, Abydos High School is no longer existed. Everyone is shocked, but still argues with the existence of "The Foreclosure Task Force" - however, according to Ayane, since it is established after the dissolution of the Student Union, the Task Force is in fact a club that hasn't recognized officially. As a result, neither can it represent the school, nor can it be proved to be existed.
desc.jp: Kaiser Director arrives and everyone is immediately triggered. Though claiming that they would be reported to the General Student Council, the director says it is useless and the time just proves that no one could be helping them. The director even points out that, due to Hoshino's dropout, Abydos High School is no longer existed. Everyone is shocked, but still argues with the existence of "The Foreclosure Task Force" - however, according to Ayane, since it is established after the dissolution of the Student Union, the Task Force is in fact a club that hasn't recognized officially. As a result, neither can it represent the school, nor can it be proved to be existed.
desc.zh_cn: 凯撒理事闻声走来，众人对凯撒PMC的无理侵犯表示愤怒，但理事并没有被吓倒。虽然扬言要报告联邦学生会，但理事表示联邦学生会并没有用，而且这么长时间以来的事情也证明了没人来帮助他们。理事直接指出，由于学生会成员星野退学，阿拜多斯已不复存在，众人大惊。众人以“对策委员会”尚存抗争，但绫音表示，由于学生会当时已不存在，所以它并非官方认证的社团，因而实际上无法代表学校，也无法被证明存在。

desc.en: Hoshino is in great shock upon hearing PMC were attacking Abydos. The Black Suit explains that, after her dropout, Abydos will no longer have a student belonging to the Student Union, and therefore the school will not exist. The Black suit expresses his interest on establishing a new school purposed by PMC, but then clarifies that their goal is actually Hoshino herself. The fact of cooperating with Kaiser is simply because the interests aren't in conflict. The Black Suit says, as the highest "Mythic" in Kivotos, he will be carrying out experiments on her.
desc.jp: Hoshino is in great shock upon hearing PMC were attacking Abydos. The Black Suit explains that, after her dropout, Abydos will no longer have a student belonging to the Student Union, and therefore the school will not exist. The Black suit expresses his interest on establishing a new school purposed by PMC, but then clarifies that their goal is actually Hoshino herself. The fact of cooperating with Kaiser is simply because the interests aren't in conflict. The Black Suit says, as the highest "Mythic" in Kivotos, he will be carrying out experiments on her.
desc.zh_cn: 星野听到PMC攻击阿拜多斯时震惊无比。黑服向星野解释，因为她自己退学，阿拜多斯就没有了学生会成员（即没有了学生会），由此学校已经不复存在。黑服表示了对PMC建立一所新学校的兴趣，但随后表示他们的目标实际上是星野自己，而与凯撒联手仅仅是因为利益不冲突罢了。黑服表示，作为基沃托斯最高的“神秘”，他将会对她进行实验。

desc.en: The director is surprised to hear that the Abydos are really going to pay the debts, but then he questions whether it would be meaningful or pointless. No one could give an answer - when the PMC troops are under a surprise attack.
desc.jp: The director is surprised to hear that the Abydos are really going to pay the debts, but then he questions whether it would be meaningful or pointless. No one could give an answer - when the PMC troops are under a surprise attack.
desc.zh_cn: 理事对阿拜多斯一行人居然真的并非嘴上说说，而是要真的还款一直感到震惊，但随后便反问能否做到以及这究竟有何意义。众人哑口无言，而这时PMC部队突然受到了意外攻击。

desc.en: Despite the Kaiser director's outrage, Sensei, the Foreclosure Task Force, and Problem Solver make use of the sudden turn of events to launch a counteroffensive against the PMC forces.
desc.jp: Despite the Kaiser director's outrage, Sensei, the Foreclosure Task Force, and Problem Solver make use of the sudden turn of events to launch a counteroffensive against the PMC forces.
desc.zh_cn: 凯萨理事对这意想不到的状况非常气愤。而老师则指挥对策委员会和便利屋学生对抗PMC士兵。

desc.en: The PMC forces finally retreats following an arduous battle. Later, Sensei seeks out Black Suit personally to negotiate Hoshino's return.
desc.jp: The PMC forces finally retreats following an arduous battle. Later, Sensei seeks out Black Suit personally to negotiate Hoshino's return.
desc.zh_cn: 混战结束后PMC士兵撤退。老师为了寻找解救星野的方法，直接去找黑色西装人。

desc.en: The director is both shocked and angry to see that the Problem Solver 68 betrayed them, but the latter insults them back. Sensei confronts the director, demanding that Hoshino be returned. The director doesn't step back. Everyone is forced to engage the enemies.
desc.jp: The director is both shocked and angry to see that the Problem Solver 68 betrayed them, but the latter insults them back. Sensei confronts the director, demanding that Hoshino be returned. The director doesn't step back. Everyone is forced to engage the enemies.
desc.zh_cn: 理事对便利屋68背叛他们又惊又怒，但便利屋一行人予以了回敬。老师对峙理事，要求将星野还回来，但后者并未让步。不得已，一行人继续应战。

desc.en: 除了第六個聖所之外，其他聖所的守護者攻略都已經準備好，所有自治區也完成了防禦準備，就在此時，夏萊附近出現了大量的無名守護者。就在千鈞一髮之際，意外的幫手出現協助防禦夏萊。
desc.jp: 除了第六個聖所之外，其他聖所的守護者攻略都已經準備好，所有自治區也完成了防禦準備，就在此時，夏萊附近出現了大量的無名守護者。就在千鈞一髮之際，意外的幫手出現協助防禦夏萊。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 除了第六个圣所之外，其他圣所的守护者攻略都已经准备好，所有自治区也完成了防御准备，就在此时，夏莱附近出现了大量的无名守护者。就在千钧一发之际，意外的帮手出现协助防御夏莱。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 除了第六个圣所之外，其他圣所的守护者攻略都已经准备好，所有自治区也完成了防御准备，就在此时，夏莱附近出现了大量的无名守护者。就在千钧一发之际，意外的帮手出现协助防御夏莱。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 除了第六个圣所之外，其他圣所的守护者攻略都已经准备好，所有自治区也完成了防御准备，就在此时，沙勒附近出现了大量的无名守护者。就在千钧一发之际，意外的帮手出现协助防御沙勒。

desc.en: 所有自治區的防禦作戰、以及聖所守護者的攻略都準備就緒了，作戰即將開始。
desc.jp: 所有自治區的防禦作戰、以及聖所守護者的攻略都準備就緒了，作戰即將開始。
desc.zh_cn: 所有自治区的防御作战、以及圣所守护者的攻略都准备就绪了，作战即将开始。

desc.en: 五個聖所和所有自治區的戰鬥全部結束。
desc.jp: 五個聖所和所有自治區的戰鬥全部結束。
desc.zh_cn: 五个圣所和所有自治区的战斗全部结束。

She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.

desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。
